subject: [Radiance-general] Re: HDR MIME typ
body:
Hi Axel,
A google on MIME found these sites, which might answer your questions.

http://www.mhonarc.org/~ehood/MIME/
http://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/
http://www.ietf.org/    (type MIME into the ietf search box for a link
to 2 memos on MIME types)

Out of curiosity I tried the "athens..." site. I was able to download
to the desktop and open with Photosphere. The hdr extension was
preserved.
Paul
________________________________________
